---
name: Feature Request
description: Suggest a new feature or improvement
labels: ["enhancement"]
---

## Problem / Motivation

What problem does this solve, or what use case does it enable?

## Proposed Solution

How should this work? Be as specific as possible.

## Alternatives Considered

Other approaches you thought about and why they're less suitable.

## Additional Context

Any other information, mockups, or references.

---

**Note:** Proposals that conflict with [FOUNDATIONS.md](../../FOUNDATIONS.md) will be rejected regardless of technical merit. If you're unsure whether your proposal aligns, open a discussion first.
